statements: SELECT * FROM competitor_activities
SELECT competitor_name, activity_date FROM competitor_activities WHERE activity_id = 1
SELECT * FROM competitor_activities WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Corp'
SELECT activity_description FROM competitor_activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT competitor_name, marketing_strategy_adjustment FROM competitor_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM competitor_activities ORDER BY competitor_name ASC, activity_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, activity_description FROM competitor_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_name, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM competitor_activities GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT competitor_name FROM competitor_activities WHERE marketing_strategy_adjustment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT competitor_name, activity_description FROM competitor_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%innovation%';
SELECT * FROM CompetitorActivities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM CompetitorActivities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_id, activity_name FROM CompetitorActivities WHERE competitor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE strategy_type = 'Digital';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, implementation_date FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE implementation_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT competitor_id, activity_name, activity_date, activity_description FROM CompetitorActivities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description, activity_date, competitor_id FROM CompetitorActivities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, implementation_date, strategy_type FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT competitor_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM CompetitorActivities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CompetitorActivities JOIN MarketingStrategies ON CompetitorActivities.competitor_id = MarketingStrategies.strategy_id WHERE implementation_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Competitors WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT id, name, revenue FROM Competitors WHERE employee_count > 500 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT name, industry, headquarters FROM Competitors WHERE revenue > 1000000 AND employee_count BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' AND end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM MarketingStrategies WHERE budget >= 5000 AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT id, name, strategy_name FROM Campaigns c INNER JOIN MarketingStrategies ms ON c.id = ms.id
SELECT name, industry, revenue FROM Competitors WHERE employee_count > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT name, headquarters, employee_count FROM Competitors WHERE industry = 'Technology'
SELECT * FROM competitor_data ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, activity_type FROM competitor_data WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(performance_value) AS max_performance_value FROM marketing_performance;
SELECT competitor_name, analysis_date, analysis_result FROM competitor_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM competitor_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, activity_type FROM competitor_data WHERE activity_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, company_name, activity_type FROM competitor_data ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, analysis_result FROM competitor_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM marketing_strategies WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Competitors;
SELECT name, product_category FROM Competitors WHERE market_share > 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM Sales_Reports;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_description FROM Marketing_Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Competitors WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT name, market_share FROM Competitors ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, budget FROM Marketing_Strategies WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT sale_date, product_sold FROM Sales_Reports WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM Marketing_Events WHERE event_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
